scripts.build: ./node_modules/phplint/cli.js *.php application/*/*.php application/*/*/*.php && ./node_modules/less/bin/lessc --clean-css="--s0" assets/stylesheet.less assets/stylesheet.min.css && ./node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint assets/script.js && ./node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs -co assets/script.min.js -- assets/script.js
